short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience with customizable Accessibility features and a built-in Screen Reader for the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Accessio for Accessibility is a Chrome browser extension that provides accessibility to the user’s current webpage structure. It is designed to make the web more accessible for everyone. With Accessio, you can tailor your browsing experience to your specific needs by adjusting font sizes, using the context menu to read selected text, activating the built-in screen reader, and more. The extension has a popup user interface with a variety of useful buttons that provide accessibility features to the active webpage’s structure. You can toggle their functionality on or off with a simple click. When enabled, some features will remain active even if you navigate to a new page or reload the current page. Download Accessio for Accessibility today and start browsing the web with ease!

Features: 
- Screen Reader
- Change font size
- Change font family
- Change text align
- Change font weight
- Change font style
- Increase letter spacing
- Increase word spacing
- Increase line height
- Switch to dark/light mode
- Hide images
- Change saturation value
- Change shape, size and color of cursor
- Highlight links
- Text-to-Speech


Accessibility is a right, not a privilege.
